name: Nyx
description: Nyx. ancient goddess of night, reigns over darkness and dreams. Her star-woven gown drifts as she walks, leaving silence beyond measure and dreams without end.

skills.name: Evernight Raid
skills.description: Nyx blinks behind the symmetrically opposite enemy at combat start, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK. She also prevents the target from recovering Energy for 8s and stuns them for 3s.

skills.name: Nocturnal Judgment
skills.description: Performs a 4-hit combo on the nearest enemy, each hit dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK. Nyx is untargetable and continuously controls the enemy during this. The final hit stuns the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: The last hit deals bonus DMG equal to 10% of the target's lost HP (up to 200% of Nyx's ATK).
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG per hit to 200% ATK.
upgrades.level4: The last hit deals bonus DMG equal to 15% of the target's lost HP (up to 300% of Nyx's ATK). (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Encroaching Nightfall
skills.description: Nyx creates a Dark Domain in an enemy-clustered area and becomes untargetable for the duration. She strikes enemies in Dark Domain 3 times, each dealing DMG equal to 150% of ATK. She emerges in the end and deals DMG equal to 250% of ATK to all enemies in Dark Domain.

upgrades.level2: Strikes enemies in Dark Domain 3 times, each dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the final hit's DMG to 280%.
upgrades.level4: The final hit is guaranteed to be a CRIT hit.

skills.name: Domain of Night
skills.description: For each surviving ally (excluding minions) on the battlefield, Nyx gains 5% Dodge Rate and a 4% ATK boost.

upgrades.level2: For each surviving ally on the field (excluding summons), Nyx gains 10% Dodge Rate and a 5% ATK boost.
upgrades.level3: During the first 10s of the battle, this skill's bonus is doubled.
upgrades.level4: For each surviving ally on the field (excluding summons), Nyx gains 20% Dodge Rate and a 6% ATK boost. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Darkest Fear
relic.description: If a target marked by Evernight Raid is defeated, applies Terror to enemies near the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: Enemies damaged by Evernight Raid cannot receive shields or healing. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: If a target marked by Evernight Raid is defeated, applies Terror to enemies near the target for 3s. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: All DMG dealt by Nyx ignores 70% of the target's Armor. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
